Class MailDailyRequestsWorkedOn

java.lang.Object

      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          transbit.tbits.report.MailDailyRequestsWorkedOn
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, TBitsPropEnum
public class MailDailyRequestsWorkedOn
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
implements TBitsPropEnum

The MailDailyRequestsWorkedOn class generates reports listing all tasks worked on today or a specified period for the specified business area
